pkgmetadata.longdescription: A graphical user interface for calculating power and sample size for hierarchical data // HierO is a graphical user interface (GUI) tool for calculating optimal statistical power and sample size for hierarchical data structure. HierO constructs a user defined sample size optimization problem to GAMS (General Algebraic Modeling System)form and uses Rneos package to send the problem to NEOS server for solving.
